A **lesser nightmare**, u, is a type of [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") that appears in [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack") and [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"). Lesser nightmares are [herbivorous](/wiki/Herbivorous "Herbivorous") and [domestic](/wiki/Domestic "Domestic") [horse-like](/wiki/Unicorn_or_horse "Unicorn or horse") monsters that serve as the [chaotic](/wiki/Chaotic "Chaotic") equivalent of the [pony](/wiki/Pony "Pony") and possess most of the same qualities.

A lesser nightmare has a [kick](/wiki/Kick "Kick") attack and a [poisonous](/wiki/Poisonous "Poisonous") bite attack, and possesses [poison resistance](/wiki/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance").

Eating a lesser nightmare [corpse](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse") or [tin](/wiki/Tin "Tin") conveys 14% [additional](/wiki/Partial_intrinsic "Partial intrinsic") poison resistance.

## Generation

Lesser nightmares may be generated as peaceful for chaotic characters. A lesser nightmare can [grow up](/wiki/Grow_up "Grow up") into a [(greater) nightmare](/wiki/Nightmare_\(EvilHack\) "Nightmare (EvilHack)").

Chaotic [Knights](/wiki/Knight "Knight") begin the game with a [saddled](/wiki/Saddled "Saddled") lesser nightmare as their default pet.

Lesser nightmares appear among the random u that are part of the second quest [monster class](/wiki/Monster_class "Monster class") for [Infidels](/wiki/Infidel "Infidel") and make up 24⁄175 of the monsters randomly generated on the [Infidel quest](/wiki/Infidel_quest "Infidel quest").

## Encyclopedia entry

By a route obscure and lonely,  
Haunted by ill angels only,  
Where an Eidolon, named NIGHT,  
On a black throne reigns upright,  
I have reached these lands but newly  
From an ultimate dim Thule--  
From a wild weird clime that lieth, sublime,  
Out of SPACE -- Out of TIME.  
\[ Dream-Land, by Edgar Allen Poe ]

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Lesser_nightmare\&action=edit)*

html:
Lesser nightmare

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
u lesser nightmare (No tile)
Difficulty 5
Attacks Kick 1d6 physical, Bite 1d2 poison
u lesser nightmare (No tile)
Difficulty 5
Attacks

Kick 1d6 physical, Bite 1d2 poison

Base level 3
Base experience 19
Speed 16
Base AC 6
Base MR 0
Alignment -9 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 2 (Quite rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 1300
Nutritional value 250
Size Medium
Resistances poison
Resistances conveyed poison (+14%)

A lesser nightmare:

  • has no hands.
  • is an animal.
  • is herbivorous.
  • can be tamed by feeding.
  • wanders randomly.
  • is strong.
  • can be seen through infravision.
Reference EvilHack - monst.c, line 1134

A lesser nightmare, u, is a type of monster that appears in EvilHack and Hack'EM. Lesser nightmares are herbivorous and domestic horse-like monsters that serve as the chaotic equivalent of the pony and possess most of the same qualities.

A lesser nightmare has a kick attack and a poisonous bite attack, and possesses poison resistance.

Eating a lesser nightmare corpse or tin conveys 14% additional poison resistance.

Generation

Lesser nightmares may be generated as peaceful for chaotic characters. A lesser nightmare can grow up into a (greater) nightmare.

Chaotic Knights begin the game with a saddled lesser nightmare as their default pet.

Lesser nightmares appear among the random u that are part of the second quest monster class for Infidels and make up 24⁄175 of the monsters randomly generated on the Infidel quest.

Encyclopedia entry

By a route obscure and lonely,
Haunted by ill angels only,
Where an Eidolon, named NIGHT,
On a black throne reigns upright,
I have reached these lands but newly
From an ultimate dim Thule--
From a wild weird clime that lieth, sublime,
Out of SPACE -- Out of TIME.
[ Dream-Land, by Edgar Allen Poe ]

A '''lesser nightmare''', {{green|u}}, is a type of [[monster]] that appears in [[EvilHack]] and [[Hack'EM]]. Lesser nightmares are [[herbivorous]] and [[domestic]] [[Unicorn or horse|horse-like]] monsters that serve as the [[chaotic]] equivalent of the [[pony]] and possess most of the same qualities.

A lesser nightmare has a [[kick]] attack and a [[poisonous]] bite attack, and possesses [[poison resistance]].

Eating a lesser nightmare [[corpse]] or [[tin]] conveys 14% [[Partial intrinsic|additional]] poison resistance.

==Generation==
Lesser nightmares may be generated as peaceful for chaotic characters. A lesser nightmare can [[grow up]] into a [[Nightmare (EvilHack)|(greater) nightmare]].

Chaotic [[Knight]]s begin the game with a [[saddled]] lesser nightmare as their default pet.

Lesser nightmares appear among the random {{white|u}} that are part of the second quest [[monster class]] for [[Infidel]]s and make up {{frac|24|175}} of the monsters randomly generated on the [[Infidel quest]].
